## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G31805](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G31805)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>POLAR</u>
- **Gene Name:** POLAR LOCALIZATION DURING ASYMMETRIC DIVISION AND REDISTRIBUTION
- **Description:**   WRKY family transcription factor;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
